column17:
Coal CS A 336 Heating Pad Price: Rs.399

Compact rechargeable heat pad ideal for providing instant relief from pain It also works in the treatment of sports injuries arthritis sore neck backache toothache menstrual cramps hypothermia sprains growing pains etc. Heat pad is rechargeable and it can be charged just like mobile phone Pad can be used continuously for 60 to 90 minutes Heating pad is odourless and leaves no side effects It is easy to use and carry Shockproof and consumes less electricity It has auto warm function easy to use It does not require filling of water It contains permanent pre-filled solution How to use: Insert the power cord on the product to the socket and connect the power A red light (indicator) starts immediately showing heating is in process After 8 to 12 minutes indicator switches off automatically and heat pad is ready to use Once heat pad is charged it will remain hot for the period of 60 to 90 minutes Pad is filled with Galvanothermy energy conversion agent which works in warming up quickly and keeping the product hot for long time Caution: Do not use the heat pad when on charge Make sure to check the tightness of the plug before every heating Make sure the power socket is upward do not charge when the product is tilted or inverted ot advisable for use on children below 6 years of age.
